keyword: how many calories in a boba
title: How Many Calories in a Boba?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a boba with full nutrition facts, including carbs, sugar, and tweaks for a standard 16 oz milk tea serving.
h1: How Many Calories in a Boba?
assumptions: Standard 16 oz serving of black milk tea with whole milk, 2 tbsp sugar syrup, and 1/4 cup cooked tapioca pearls; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by shop, milk type, sweetness level, pearl amount, and size. Check menus or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard boba milk tea contains about 299 kcal, mostly from sugars and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use skim milk instead of whole

faqs.q: How many calories in a boba tea?
faqs.a: About 299 kcal for a standard 16 oz milk tea with pearls.
Yes, typically 50 g sugars per serving from syrup and milk.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a boba?
faqs.a: Around 60 g carbs, mainly from tapioca pearls and added sugars.

faqs.q: Can I make boba lower calorie?
faqs.a: Opt for less sugar, non-dairy milk, or black tea without pearls to reduce calories.

faqs.q: How does boba size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger sizes (24 oz) can add 100-200 kcal; small (12 oz) subtracts about 100 kcal.
